name: Diebrary
description:
Choose 1 of 5 main characters, each equipped with their own unique abilities and skills!

Who will help you defeat the evil hordes?

The Elph? The Cone Dog? Or the Barbarian?




With 7 primary weapons, and 12 secondary weapons - things will start to get hectic, real quick.

A wand, a spear, a bow and a boomerang will make you mow smoothly through thousands of enemies.

Test and experiment to find the perfect combination.

Enemies beware!




Early in the game you will stumble upon a caged pet.

They’re surprisingly powerful Allies in your fight with hordes of foes!

Plus, they're pretty darn cute.




Unlock boosts with the currency you gain during every run to make your Character stronger.

Temporary boosts stay with you for the run, perks unlocked in the perk store help you get farther in the game.

And if you'd like to try something new, you can always refund and shuffle your boosts as you wish!



Play the same Story in async multiplayer with your friends and vote on how the Story evolves at the end of each Chapter!

There are over 50 Plot Twists to throw in the mix, you'll find something different each run!

Story Twists

When playing together with friends, each of you can play through every Chapter solo, and then place your votes for Plot Twists at the end.

After the voting ends, a Plot Twist is chosen and takes effect for ALL players in the Story!
